name: Abbey Road
description: This is the Beatles' final studio album, known for its innovative production and the iconic cover with the band crossing a zebra crossing.

name: Let It Bleed
description: This album features classic tracks like 'Gimme Shelter' and 'You Can't Always Get What You Want,' representing the peak of the Rolling Stones' psychedelic era.

name: Led Zeppelin - IV
description: Considered one of the greatest rock albums of all time, featuring tracks like 'Stairway to Heaven.

name: The Dark Side of the Moon
description: A landmark in progressive rock, with experimental sounds, and one of the best-selling albums of all time.

name: The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust and the Spiders from Mars
description: This conceptual album marked the beginning of the Ziggy Stardust era, blending glam rock with futuristic influences.

name: A Night at the Opera
description: Containing the epic 'Bohemian Rhapsody,' this album represents the fusion of various musical styles, from rock to opera.

name: Rumours
description: This pop rock album became one of the best-selling albums of all time, with hits like 'Go Your Own Way' and 'Dreams.

name: London Calling
description: A blend of punk rock with reggae, ska, and rockabilly, this album is one of the greatest punk records of all time.

name: Thriller
description: One of the best-selling albums of all time, featuring hits like 'Billie Jean' and 'Beat It.

name: Purple Rain
description: The soundtrack to the movie of the same name, containing tracks that defined Prince's career, like 'When Doves Cry' and 'Let's Go Crazy.

name: The Joshua Tree
description: One of the greatest rock albums of the 80s, with tracks like 'With or Without You' and 'I Still Haven't Found What I'm Looking For.

name: Born in the U.S.A.
description: Considered Springsteen's greatest success, this album mixes rock with political and social themes.

name: Back in Black
description: One of the greatest hard rock albums of all time, featuring the iconic riff of 'Back in Black.

name: Whitney
description: Includes hits like 'I Wanna Dance with Somebody' and 'Didn't We Almost Have It All,' solidifying Houston's pop supremacy.

name: Like a Virgin
description: This album cemented Madonna as the 'Queen of Pop,' with hits like 'Material Girl' and 'Like a Virgin.

name: Synchronicity
description: One of the band's greatest successes, featuring tracks like 'Every Breath You Take' and 'King of Pain.

name: Private Dancer
description: One of Tina Turner's most iconic albums, with hits like 'What's Love Got to Do with It' and 'Private Dancer.

name: She's So Unusual
description: This album marked the beginning of Cyndi Lauper's solo career, with hits like 'Girls Just Want to Have Fun' and 'Time After Time.

name: Legend
description: The definitive compilation of Bob Marley's greatest hits, featuring songs like 'No Woman, No Cry' and 'Buffalo Soldier.

name: Bridge Over Troubled Water
description: This album is one of the duo's masterpieces, with classic tracks like 'Bridge Over Troubled Water.
